The Industry Experts in Crime Scene Cleaning, Forensic Cleaning, Biological Remediation and Meth Lab Decontamination throughout Perth and regional Western Australia

There is never an easy time to deal with crime scene, trauma, and biohazard cleanups. If a loved one, family member, or you have fallen victim to a crime in Perth, Mandurah, Bunbury, Esperance, Geraldton, Margaret River, Exmouth, Karratha, Port Headland, Broome and all regions in Western Australia, Crime Scene Cleaners Perth is here to assist.

Crime Scene Clean-Up, Biological Restoration and Forensic Cleaning Services

At Crime Scene Cleaners Perth, we are here to help you in this time of stress specialising in crime scene clean ups and biohazard remediation so you donâ€™t have to. The area of a contamination you have experienced needs to be cleaned, disinfected and sanitised of all bio-hazards. Our team of trained, qualified and experienced crime scene clean up technicians are certified to ensure the bio-affected area is completely sanitised.
Our process will eliminate any harmful conditions that have resulted due to a crime, biological hazard, water or sewage damage and restore the area back into a safe environment. The technically trained and experienced expert technicians provide specialist cleaning and restoration services covering all requirements from water and flood damage to fire and smoke damage and crime scene clean ups and unattended death scene clean ups.

Crime Scene & Biological Remediation Experts

Crime Scene Cleaners Perth provides a superior and prompt biohazard remediation and forensic cleaning service across Perth and Western Australia. Our highly skilled and IICRC trained biohazard remediation technicians possess the required knowledge to successfully and promptly remediated any biohazard and forensic scene to a habitable and safe environment. Harnessing years of combined forensic cleaning experience, Crime Scene Cleaners Perth specialistsâ€™ top priority for each and every job is to provide our clients with a superior service by the implementation of tried and tested, job-specific remediation procedures for prompt, reliable and successful biohazard remediation and forensic cleaning services.

Prompt & Discreet Biohazard Restoration Services

Crime Scene Cleaners Perth technicians appreciate that not only are these situations unexpected and upsetting, but they can also be dangerous to deal with and difficult to clean. The forensic cleaning and crime scene cleaning services we provide is more than a cleaning regimen. We pride ourselves on providing a superior forensic cleans ensuring our transactions with customers are to the highest standards, as often they are working through difficult personal circumstances. When it comes to bio-restoration services, our commitment to training, safety and professionalism is second to none. Thus, we use discreetly marked vehicles to maintain confidentiality.

Customer Focussed & Compassionate Forensic Cleaners

We appreciate the nature of our job is often a result of a highly distressing and traumatic period, and offer a sympathetic and compassionate service, maintaining our reputable standard of service by offering guidance and support through these trying times. When you call our Perth Crime Scene Cleaners you will speak to an industry expert. Our technicians are on hand 24 hours a day to assist you with your Perth Crime Scene and Biological Cleaning needs. We believe our clients deserve the highest quality of service provided with dignity and respect. By choosing Perth Crime Scene Cleaning, we will provide you with the assurance that competent biological remediation technicians are performing our service.

Crime Scene Cleaners Perth IICRC Trained Remediation Technicians

Crime Scene Cleaner Perth is a premier biohazard remediation company, dedicated to easing emotional trauma and property damage and contamination for those who have had a homicide, suicide, or unattended death in their home or place of business. We are committed to protecting the safety of our clients in Perth and Western Australia. Our expert Perth crime scene cleaning technicians, forensic cleaning technicians and biological cleaning technicians are trained in blood-borne pathogen controls, respiratory protection, personal protective equipment and hazardous communications. We provide Internationally Trained and IICRC Certified technicians and supervisors who are experts in their field, possessing necessary knowledge and experience to return your home or business to a safe, habitable and biohazard free condition.

Crime Scene Cleaners Perth Expert Services

Crime Scene Cleaning Services

The aftermath of a crime scene occurring in a property can be a traumatic and highly distressing time. The expert technicians of Crime Scene Cleaners at Crime Scene Cleaner Perth offer a wide range of crime scene cleaning services including murders, stabbings, blood and break in clean-ups and sanitisation of crime scenes. Attempting to complete a crime scene biohazard clean exposes risk subjecting you to viruses, bacteria, and other hazardous contaminants. If you donâ€™t have the proper equipment, skills and technical experience for crime scene biohazard cleaning you will not be able to thoroughly and safely clean the affected area, which means that your personal property may be damaged beyond repair.

What is Involved in Crime Scene Cleaners Perth Functions

If required, we will remove personal property and affected structural elements such as flooring, and dispose according to biohazard regulations. We treat all crime scenes as if they contain a life threatening infection, because some of the worst viruses are known to survive in blood and biological materials. Our Crime Scene Cleaning approach is multi-levelled and fully adjustable dependent on the severity of the affected property. Our Crime Scene Cleaner Perth technicians start by removing all traces of dirt, chemicals, blood and biological materials from the affected area. Personal property that cannot be remediated must be disassembled and disposed of as medical waste. After cleaning, technicians treat the affected zone with disinfectants and sanitisers to remove all biological sources and will utilise deodoriser to eliminate the possibility of lingering odours.

Why Choose Crime Scene Cleaners Perth for your Biological Decontamination

The skills which are required to conduct crime scene cleaning require extensive training and expertise and we are proud of the fact that we are one of the very few companies in Perth that services all regional areas in Western Australia from Broome to Esperance and everywhere in between. Our Crime Scene Cleaners in Perth possess both the training and the qualifications to deliver the very best Crime Scene Cleaning Service in Perth. Our team of Crime Scene Cleaners provide a state-wide service and we are used on a regular basis by private clients, real estate agents and insurance companies. We understand the importance of discretion and professionalism and all of our Perth Crime Scene Cleaner technicians have been trained to ensure that our work is conducted in an appropriate manner to ensure the minimum fuss while delivering a first class crime scene cleaning service. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth teams are fully insured, experienced biohazard remediation and crime scene cleaning specialists who utilise personal protective equipment and follow approved safety and disinfection procedures to help return the scene to a safe, clean state.

Forensic Cleaning Services

The Forensic cleaning services that Crime Scene Cleaner Perth offers cover a wide range of areas. Crime scenes, blood and trauma, clandestine drug labs and more all require specialist and certified forensic cleaning remediation professionals to ensure the affected area is left in a safe and biohazard free state. There is never an easy time to deal with the cleaning and restoration of a situation that requires forensic cleaning specialists. One of the many unfortunate truths about a crime scene is that the loved ones of the victims are left to clean up the area. When this type of situation occurs, it is imperative the remediation process begins as soon as possible. When an unexpected event leaves you with a painful loss and the requirement for Forensic Cleaning or Biohazard Cleaning in Perth, Crime Scene Cleaner Perth technicians are here to help alleviate the stresses associated with the remediation process

Prompt and Reliable Forensic Cleaning Biological Remediation in Perth

The skills which are required to conduct forensic cleaning to a high standard are highly specialised. As one of the few organisations within Perth and Western Australia who can conduct forensic and biohazard clean up services, we ensure all material removed is disposed of at an appropriate facility in line with government legislation ensuring there is no additional and unwarranted risk to the environment or human health. Forensic Cleaning deals with the sanitisation of biological agents that can cause illness, injury, and death in living organisms. This includes animal and human blood and bodily tissues, viruses, bacteria, parasites and faecal matter. What may seem like a localised and harmless cleaning job or contamination can be severely misleading. Many of these organisms can live on surfaces for many hours or days and spread through various means without proper cleaning protocols.

Why Choose Crime Scene Cleaner Perth for your Forensic Cleaning Biological Restorations in Perth

A common misconception is that all areas can be fully remediated, however, saturated and porous materials such as carpets, furnishings, bedding and other belongings must be removed, replaced, and disposed of properly. Forensic cleaning is a critical part of the after care of any location that has been the scene of any serious incident involving injury or loss of life. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth experts have worked with many local authorities throughout Western Australia in dealing with the most difficult of circumstances in a professional and reliable manner. Regardless of the reason why you need to arrange forensic cleaning services in Perth or Western Australia, you can be sure that when you instruct us to undertake work on your behalf you are going to get the best results possible first time every time.

Gross Filth, Hoarding and Squalor Cleaning Services

Most people who struggle with hoarding may be trying to save items they perceive as useful for themselves, family and friends in the event they may be needed. However, hoarding is generally thought to be a form of Obsessive Compulsive Disorder and when the hoarding becomes too much to handle, the property can become dangerous for the hoarder and their family to occupy. Characterised by an extreme difficulty to part with or discard possessions, a person with a hoarding disorder can become extremely agitated and distressed with the idea of getting rid of even the most basic of items. Crime Scene Cleaners Perth specialise in providing caring and compassionate gross filth and hoarders clean ups in Perth area and across Western Australia. If someone you love struggles with hoarding, getting outside help to rid them of this burden can be the start to them finally ridding themselves of this issue.

The Dangers of Gross Filth and Hoarding in Perth

Gross Filth and Hoarding can cause significant issues to those living in this kind of environment with an increased level of pollutants in the air and biological risks with increased levels of mildew and mould growth as well as rodents, faeces and urine which can have severe health implications if not remediated. Additionally, living in a house with a gross filth, squaller or hoarding issue can lead to the increased risk of a fall and in some extreme cases, being trapped among the hoarding mess. Potential structural damage can occur to the property if the hoarding mess is left for an extended period of time and the risk of a house fire increases significantly.

Crime Scene Cleaner Perth Specialist Gross Filth and Hoarder Biological Remediation Experts

Crime Scene Cleaner Perth technicians provide a compassionate and understanding gross filth and hoarders clean up service with a tactful, respectful and caring approach during the entire process and are able to encourage your loved one to find a happy and healthy balance between items that are important and have sentimental value to keep, and the items that are not needed. Our Hoarders Clean Up specialist technicians have the skills and experience to help your loved one reclaim control of their life and home so that the property is clean and bio-hazard free for a safe and habitable environment. Our goal is to restore your home to safety and give you some relief from the burden of hoarding. Often, finding the place to start is the hardest part, so let our team help. Contact Crime Scene Cleaners Perth today for a confidential hoarding and clutter clean up consultation.

Death and Suicide Clean Up Services

When cleaning up the scene of death or suicide, it is important to remember that potential biohazards can be concealed anywhere in the property including in carpet, furniture, sub-flooring, grout and under tiles and even behind walls. When a loved one passes away, coping with their death can be difficult for their relatives and friends. Often what isnâ€™t thought about is what happens next â€“ having to remove blood, bodily fluids and odour can be an arduous task, which cannot normally be performed by standard household or commercial cleaning methods. Death and Suicide Cleaning in Perth and all Western Australian regions requires a rigorous, multi-step process to remove all traces of bio hazardous materials. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth forensic biological cleaners and technicians possess the skills and technical knowledge to successfully and expertly remediate any property requiring death and suicide cleaning in Perth and Western Australia.

Why Death & Suicide Cleaning Biological Cleaning Services are Imperative in Perth

In the case of an death and suicide clean up in Perth, the human body begins to decay only 15 minutes after the heart stops beating, and if left for day or weeks, widespread contamination will occur in the property including body fluid leaching into the flooring, walls, sub-flooring and furnishings. Additionally, an infestation of insects such as flies and cockroaches will occur and lay their eggs in and around the decomposing body that in turn, speeds up the decomposition process. Many unattended death and suicide cleaning situations pose serious health risks to property owners and occupants, and the biohazard remediation technicians due to the potential exposure to blood borne pathogens. Exposure to blood borne viruses can occur due to direct contact with scratches and sores, accidental injury from biological waste, inhalation and exposure from blood or biological hazardous fluid to the eyes, nose or mouth. Considering the health risks, Crime Scene Cleaner Perth technicians are adept in death and suicide cleaning bioremediation and follow stringent health and safety regulations and meticulous decontamination procedures most clean up technicians are not accustomed to.

Why Crime Scene Cleaner Perth Death and Suicide Technicians are Experts in their Biological Field

Crime Scene Cleaner Perthâ€™s fully qualified and trained Unattended Death and Suicide Clean Up technicians possess the skills and industry-specific knowledge to successfully remediate any property affected. Calling a professional company to handle a Death and Suicide Clean up in Perth and Western Australia reduces your risk of coming into contact with the biological and hazardous materials. With strong forensic cleaning awareness, our remediation experts work promptly to sanitise the affected property including cleaning or removing any contaminated items or furnishings to restore the property back to a safe and habitable, biohazard contamination free state. Our Death and Suicide Clean Up technicians understand the importance of discretion and professionalism.

Meth Lab Decontamination and Remediation Services

As the number of meth labs being found increases, so to does the risks associated with unmediated meth lab properties for not only current occupants, but future occupants. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth meth lab decontamination technicians prides themselves in being Western Australiaâ€™s premier meth lab remediation company. Each one of our specialised meth lab remediation technicians have extensive experience and knowledge in dealing with all aspects of the job. Ranging in scale from small â€˜shake and bakeâ€™ operations to sophisticated and highly toxic and volatile operations, the chemicals and hazardous nature of chemical by-products found in these labs poses a significant risk for those who operate these labs, and anyone in the vicinity. According to the 2016 Australian Crime Commission report, the majority of clandestine laboratories continue to be detected in residential areas, with increased detections in public places, rural and commercial locations in 2014â€“15. What is more alarming is that of the 667 meth labs detected, it is estimated that number represents only 10% of the total methamphetamine drug labs in Australia. And of that number, nearly all crop up in rental properties that are then re-leased after the lab is removed.

Why is a Meth Lab Remediation in Perth a Vital Service

In Perth and Western Australia, the police exit the picture very early on. They wonâ€™t provide the meth lab remediation service; theyâ€™ll just take the evidence they need. They will then issue a notice to the environmental health officer at the local government and itâ€™s their responsibility to contact the property owner. Sometimes the lab isnâ€™t detected. As meth is a drug with an enormous waste to product ratio (six parts toxic runoff to every one part of saleable meth), a house can be a poisonous place if no oneâ€™s cleaned it up. Meth lab remediation in Perth and Western Australia can involve a number of stringent and important steps to ensure the property is left in a non-hazardous, occupiable state. Methamphetamine production, or â€˜cookingâ€™ methods are almost always crude and hugely dangerous, where precursors, reagents, solvents, and waste products pose risks to the short, and long-term health of those unknowingly exposed to them. Residue of the manufacturing process contaminates properties throughout the country, where no standardised method of meth lab decontamination exists.

What does Perth and Western Australia Meth Lab Remediation Entail

Crime Scene Cleaner Perth Meth Lab decontamination experts follow a stringent and methodical proven process to ensure the property is remediated to a hazard and chemical free zone. We provide a comprehensive meth lab restoration and remediation service across Perth and Western Australian cities, towns and regional areas. Once any materials have been removed, our technicians will conduct an onsite survey to gain a preliminary assessment of the affected area and complete a remediation action plan. Next, pre-forensic testing is required to establish contamination levels and areas that are affected. Preliminary meth lab testing is crucial and will significantly reduce costs associated in the meth lab remediation process by singling out contaminated areas only and the automatic discarding of any furnishings or materials too contaminated to be cleaned.

Why Choose Crime Scene Cleaner Perth for Clandestine Drug Lab Remediation

Our Meth Lab Remediation technicians follow a stringent and methodical proven process to ensure the property is remediated to a hazard and chemical free zone. The post-forensic test and validation for re-habitation is a crucial step of the decontamination process. The property will be re-tested and samples sent to an independent laboratory for analysis. If you are living in a property once used a meth lab or are concerned you property has been contamination with meth, contact the team of specialised and experienced Meth Lab Clean Up technicians in Perth and Western Australia contact Crime Scene Cleaner Perth for a hassle free and discreet discussion with a certified meth lab remediation technician. Learn more about the Meth Lab Decontamination and Remediation Process provided in Perth here.

Sewage Clean-up and Water Restoration Services There may be no event more alarming for a homeowner than coming home to find out their home requires sewage and water restoration clean up services. At that moment, Crime Scene Cleaners Perth technicians can put your mind at rest. We can quickly return your home to a fully cleaned and habitable condition that is safe for you and especially for any particularly vulnerable members of your household such as children or the elderly. When sewage or water has entered your home due to a flood, severe rainstorm, clogged pipes or broken sewer lines, it must be cleaned up before contaminants can begin to grow on your homeâ€™s surfaces. Every bit of water and waste must be removed thoroughly and then decontamination must start. Itâ€™s essential that the technicians working on your sewage and water clean up be certified to follow the standards of the Institute of Inspection, Cleaning and Restoration Certification (IICRC). This is the organisation that has determined the safety standards for a job as critical as sewage and water restoration clean up. Leaving Sewage Clean-up to Professionals Crime Scene Cleaner Perth is Western Australiaâ€™s largest provider of drainage, sewage and water remediation services offering nation-wide coverage no matter how big or small the sewage or water leak problem may appear. The strength of our in-house sewage, drainage, water and mould remediation expertise means that whatever the problem may be, our team of experienced and knowledgeable remediation technicians are able to find a solution efficiently and cost-effectively. In planning for the clean-up of a sewage contaminated building, there are important considerations that an onsite expert would consider, such as the safety of building entry, health risks to occupants in other building areas, the scope of clean-up work needed, what materials can be salvaged and what items should be discarded, and the protection of other building areas during the clean-up, such as a consideration of the ease with which air or dust can move from a contaminated area into the occupied building space. Crime Scene Cleaners Perth sewage clean up technicians excel in all areas of sewage clean ups including Sewage Contamination Remediation, Grey Water Leak Clean Ups, Mould Damage Remediation, Fire Damage Restoration, Burst Water Pipe Clean Up, Faecal & Urine Clean Ups, Raw Sewage Clean Ups, Flood Water Damage Restoration and Water Damage Restoration. Why use Crime Scene Cleaner Perth for your Sewage and Water Restoration Needs Homeowners are advised to only utilise appropriately trained and certified sewage remediation technicians. It is not safe to remain in any building that has been contaminated with sewage unless the contaminated area has been fully sealed off and the air into and out of the contaminated area is fully controlled. Crime Scene Cleaners Perth technicians decontaminating sewage leaks and water inundation are properly vaccinated due to the quantity of disease-causing viruses, bacteria and fungi normally present in sewage or flood water leak. Any absorbent materials that canâ€™t be thoroughly washed, decontaminated and sanitised must be disposed of in such a way to prevent contact with non-contaminated areas of the affected property. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth can help you get your life and your home back to normal. We are expertly trained to understand the dangers of the pathogens in sewage and we will treat your home as though it were our own. Our qualified and experienced sewage clean up remediation experts will arrive when you need us, regardless of whether itâ€™s a public holiday or weekend. A key feature of our company is the strong, long-term client relationships we build, based on excellent customer service. This is supported by continuous investment in our equipment, plant and in our people, through comprehensive and on-going training. The team at Crime Scene Cleaner Perth want the same thing you do; your family back in your sanitary and habitable home as soon as possible. If you have the misfortune to experience a sewage infiltration of your home, call us immediately for a prompt, reliable and discreet sewage and water remediation clean up service. Read on to learn more about the Sewage Clean Up and Water Restoration services we provide in Perth and WA.
Sharps and Needle Clean Up Services Attempting to complete a needle sweep can result in an unwanted and potentially life-threatening needle-stick injury. Needle-stick injuries are wounds caused by used needles and sharps which puncture the skin due to unnecessary exposure and incorrect sweep of the area. Needle-stick injuries are serious as the potential of contracting blood-borne diseases such as HIV, Hepatitis B and Hepatitis C as well as other diseases such as Tetanos. Crime Scene Cleaner Perth Professional Sharp and Needles Sweep Technicians Sharps and needle clean ups are required whenever used needles are found in a public and private are as they can cause puncture wounds that can allow highly infectious bacteria and pathogens to be passed to the individual including HIV and Hepatitis B. Because of the serious risks associated with a sharp prick can be life-threatening, it is imperative that any sighting of a used needle be reported immediately and trained professional be called to remediate the area. When providing Sharps and Needle Sweeps in Perth and Western Australia regions, Crime Scene Cleaner Perth will only provide trained and experienced needle sweep technicians who will work methodically and systematically to ensure the area is left in a safe, needle and biohazard free state. Why Choose Crime Scene Cleaner Perth for Sharps and Needles Sweeps Crime Scene Cleaner Perth has a team of trained and specialised sharps and needle clean up experts who understand the dangers associated with the incorrect disposal of dirty and used syringes. Our team is thoroughly experienced in providing a prompt and successful needle and sharp sweep in any area including waste and rubbish, outdoor areas and properties and will guarantee all sharps and needles are found and removed before decontaminating and cleaning the area to ensure all bio-hazardous items and materials are removed.
